{"id":803074140,"question_id":42,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2Â years","timestamp":1663524715,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"39 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/803074140/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"19.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int maxHeight = -1;\n        int blocks = 0;\n        long long scanFromLeft = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < height.size(); i++) {\n            maxHeight = max(maxHeight, height[i]);\n            scanFromLeft += maxHeight;\n            blocks += height[i];\n        }\n        \n        maxHeight = -1;        \n        long long scanFromRight = 0;\n        for (int i = height.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {\n            maxHeight = max(maxHeight, height[i]);\n            scanFromRight += maxHeight;\n        }\n        \n        return scanFromLeft + scanFromRight - maxHeight * height.size() - blocks;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
